definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The Nobel has never been given out for applied sciences before.
sentences.chinese: 诺贝尔奖以前从未颁给过应用科学领域。

sentences.english: Tsinghua these days is best known for engineering and applied science.
sentences.chinese: 如今的清华以工程学科和应用科学著称。

sentences.english: We use Scientific-management system formin theerial shortage it's control.
sentences.chinese: 我们应用科学管理体系处理资料欠缺及其调节。

sentences.english: Crop Cultivation is an applied science for agricultural production directly.
sentences.chinese: 作物栽培科学是直接服务于农业生产的一门应用科学。

sentences.english: We use Scientific-management system for material shortage and its control.
sentences.chinese: 我们应用科学办理体系处理质料欠缺及其调治。

sentences.english: Garden cover plants and lawn is a new developing applied science.
sentences.chinese: 园林地被植物与草坪是一门新兴的应用科学。

sentences.english: The research was funded by TNO-Cleaning Technologies.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究是资助的应用科学研究组织清洁技术。
